title: Inkfinder 3
description: A module containing the exported Inkfinder 3 compendium.

disease.label: Disease
disease.description: This equipment applies one or more diseases. A disease is typically an affliction.

holiday.label: Holiday
holiday.description: A holiday tattoo requires only one day to prepare and one hour to Craft on the body, instead of the usual time for the Craft activity. However, because the magic of a holiday tattoo resonates with the celebration it commemorates, it can only be Crafted on the listed date at a location where the holiday is celebrated.

pledge.label: Pledge
pledge.description: This equipment inscribes a promise to uphold a principle or rule. The equipment’s beneficial abilities are suppressed for 24 hours if you violate the pledge, but the tattoo remains invested and its penalty remains in effect.

scar.label: Scar
scar.description: This equipment represents an injury from the pursuit of a greater goal

ink.label: Ink
ink.description: This equipment can be further treated to expand or alter a tattoo’s effects

consumable.label: Consumable
consumable.description: This equipment is destroyed after activation.
